item.title: Types of Coffee beans
item.description: Coffee Beans Coffee beans are the seeds of the coffee plant, known scientifically as Coffea. They are harvested from the plant’s berries or cherries when they reach maturity. Types of Coffee Beans Processing Methods Coffee beans undergo various processing methods after harvesting, which significantly influence their flavor and aroma. Some common processing methods include: Washed Process: In this method, the outer skin of the coffee cherry is removed before the beans are fermented and washed to remove any remaining fruit.
